    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.widget.CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener, roboguice.util.RoboContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditRecipeActivity, ViewRecipeActivity

    public abstract class AbstractRecipeActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements android.widget.CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener
    An abstract Activity that displays a Recipe to the user. It sets up a share action provider to share the recipe and the views that should be displayed to the user.

      • fillListLayout

        protected void fillListLayout(android.widget.LinearLayout listDirections,
                  java.util.List dataset,
                  int type)
        A method that fills a LinearLayout with data from a List of data. We don't use ListView since we don't need scrolling, our ScrollView handles that for us.
        Parameters:
        listDirections - the layout to fill
        dataset - the data that should be displayed.

      • createShareIntent

        private static android.content.Intent createShareIntent(Recipe recipe,
                                       java.io.File file)
        Creates a sharing Intent. Shares mRecipe, doesn't get it from the UI.
        Returns:
        The sharing intent.
